full_text: In 2018, the Cubs had one off day over the last 43 days of their season which ended with losses to the Br*wers in game 163 and the Rockies in the NLWC. If this rule had been in place, the Cubs would have won the division (11-8 vs Br*wers h2h) and had 3 days off before the NLDS. https://t.co/3GUu3NKHJa
